mapper.sql: STEP_UID, PRO_UID, PRO_VER_UID, ACTIVITY_BPD_ID, STEP_TYPE, STEP_OBJECT_UID, STEP_CONDITION, STEP_SORT, STEP_MODE, PRO_APP_ID, STEP_BUSINESS_KEY
s.STEP_UID, s.PRO_UID, s.PRO_VER_UID, s.ACTIVITY_BPD_ID, s.STEP_TYPE, s.STEP_OBJECT_UID, s.STEP_CONDITION, s.STEP_SORT, s.STEP_MODE, s.PRO_APP_ID, s.STEP_BUSINESS_KEY
mapper.select: select , tri.tri_title triTitle, f.dyn_title formName from DH_STEP s left join dh_trigger tri on s.STEP_OBJECT_UID = tri.tri_uid left join bpm_form f on s.STEP_OBJECT_UID = f.DYN_UID where s.STEP_UID = #{stepUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into DH_STEP (STEP_UID, PRO_UID, PRO_VER_UID, ACTIVITY_BPD_ID, STEP_TYPE, STEP_OBJECT_UID, STEP_CONDITION, STEP_SORT, STEP_MODE, PRO_APP_ID, STEP_BUSINESS_KEY) values (#{stepUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proVerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityBpdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepObjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proAppId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepBusinessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update DH_STEP
PRO_UID = #{proUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_VER_UID = #{proVerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVITY_BPD_ID = #{activityBpdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEP_TYPE = #{stepType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEP_OBJECT_UID = #{stepObjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEP_CONDITION = #{stepCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEP_SORT = #{stepSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STEP_MODE = #{stepMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_APP_ID = #{proAppId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEP_BUSINESS_KEY = #{stepBusinessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where STEP_UID = #{stepUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update DH_STEP set PRO_UID = #{proUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_VER_UID = #{proVerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVITY_BPD_ID = #{activityBpdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STEP_TYPE = #{stepType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STEP_OBJECT_UID = #{stepObjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STEP_CONDITION = #{stepCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STEP_SORT = #{stepSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STEP_MODE = #{stepMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_APP_ID = #{proAppId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STEP_BUSINESS_KEY = #{stepBusinessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where STEP_UID = #{stepUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
